title: Jack Conte: The Unexpected Story of Patreon
description:
This week we chat with Jack Conte about his journey from musician to founder to a $4 billion dollar valuation with Patreon. 
This episode is sponsored by Cometeer Coffee, check out the future of Coffee here: http://cometeer.com/colinandsamir
